Title: Entity Id
Contents: A numerical identifier for any object, enemy, NPC, spawn point, map part, collision, region, ObjAct, etc. in a map.
Not all entities need to have entity ids, and having an id does not do anything by itself.
Typically an entity id is referred to in EMEVD or Params.
Entity ids are often prefixed by the map ids
For instance, most entity ids in Great Hollow (m13_02_00_00) are 7-digit numbers like 132XXXX.
